## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                       | Type                            | Default    |
| ----------- | ----------- | --------------------------------- | ------------------------------- | ---------- |
| `alignment` | `alignment` | Set the modal alignment           | `"bottom" \| "center" \| "top"` | `"center"` |
| `open`      | `open`      | Is the modal view open or closed? | `boolean`                       | `false`    |
